alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central El Paso County through 300 PM MDT... At 215 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Black Forest, or 23 miles north of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Peyton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
